title: Cloud-Native Model Serving & Inference Backend
summary: A scalable inference backend supporting batch and real-time ML workloads with versioning, async execution, and XAI integration.

title: Azure-Kubernetes Simulation Runner
summary: Distributed simulation runner supporting autoscaling, parameter sweeps, and experiment metadata capture on AKS.

title: Feature Store Prototype for Risk Modeling
summary: Workflow for defining, materializing, and validating ML features with lineage tracking.

title: Python Library for Time-Series Signal Processing
summary: Toolkit supporting decomposition, transforms, and feature extraction for time-series workloads.

title: Document Intelligence Extraction Pipeline
summary: Pipeline for extracting structured data from unstructured financial documents.

title: Microservices Reliability & Observability Pack
summary: Tracing, metrics, and health-check utilities for ML microservices.

title: Automated Model Calibration Utilities
summary: Optimization utilities for calibration and refinement of ML and simulation models.

title: Lightweight Experiment Tracking Module
summary: Simple experiment tracker for logging parameters, metrics, and artifacts without external dependencies.
